description: VMServiceScrapeSpec defines the desired state of VMServiceScrape

attach_metadata.description: AttachMetadata configures metadata attaching from service discovery

discoveryRole.description: DiscoveryRole - defines kubernetes_sd role for objects discovery. by default, its endpoints. can be changed to service or endpointslices. note, that with service setting, you have to use port: "name" and cannot use targetPort for endpoints.

endpoints.description: A list of endpoints allowed as part of this ServiceScrape.

jobLabel.description: The label to use to retrieve the job name from.

namespaceSelector.description: Selector to select which namespaces the Endpoints objects are discovered from.

podTargetLabels.description: PodTargetLabels transfers labels on the Kubernetes Pod onto the target.

sampleLimit.description: SampleLimit defines per-scrape limit on number of scraped samples that will be accepted.

selector.description: Selector to select Endpoints objects by corresponding Service labels.

seriesLimit.description: SeriesLimit defines per-scrape limit on number of unique time series a single target can expose during all the scrapes on the time window of 24h.

targetLabels.description: TargetLabels transfers labels on the Kubernetes Service onto the target.
